title: Aground
description:
Survival is only the beginning . The only way for humanity to have a future is to return to the stars and confront them. But, it will require a lot of ingenuity and help to recover everything that was lost, and even that might not be enough. Aground is a Mining/Crafting RPG , where there is an overarching goal, story and reason to craft and build. Immortals of Aveum
As you progress, you will meet new NPCs , unlock new technology, and maybe magic too. Will you be able to raise dragons? Launch into space? The sky is literally not the limit. Beneath its simple exterior, Aground hides a lot of depth and surprises that will keep you wondering “what’s next?” Want more in the Aground universe? Try the 3D spinoff game Aground Zero !

system_requirements.Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 with ARB or EXT Framebuffer Objects
